original<-read.csv(file.choose())
attach(original)
for (variable in original){
  plot(outcome,variable)
}
names(original)
B_subset<-subset(original,outcome=="B")
N_subset<-subset(original,outcome=="N")
R_subset<-subset(original,outcome=="R")
t.test(N_subset$Radius,R_subset$Radius)
t.test(N_subset$Texture,R_subset$Texture)
t.test(N_subset$Perimiter,R_subset$Perimiter)
t.test(N_subset$Area,R_subset$Area)
t.test(N_subset$Smoothness,R_subset$Smoothness)
t.test(N_subset$Compactness,R_subset$Compactness)
t.test(N_subset$Concavity,R_subset$Concavity)
t.test(N_subset$Concave.points,R_subset$Concave.points)
t.test(N_subset$symmetry,R_subset$symmetry)
t.test(N_subset$fractal.dimension,R_subset$fractal.dimension)
